title: LRPC implies no unemployment, inflation tradeoff

content.question: Which of the following is implied by a long-run Phillips curve?

choices.label: There is no trade-off between unemployment and inflation.
The long-run aggregate supply curve is upward-sloping.
The unemployment rate falls with higher inflation.

content.answer: There is no trade-off between unemployment and inflation.
